00017 #include "MisrUtil.h"
00018 #include "MisrError.h"
00019 
00020 /* Convert calendar day to Julian day */
00021 static int julday(int year, int month, int day)
00022 { 
00023     long j1;    /*  Scratch Variable */
00024     long j2;    /*  Scratch Variable */
00025     long j3;    /*  Scratch Variable */
00026     
00027     j1 = 1461L * (year + 4800L + (month - 14L) / 12L) / 4L;  
00028     j2 = 367L * (month - 2L - (month - 14L) / 12L * 12L) / 12L;
00029     j3 = 3L * ((year + 4900L + (month - 14L) / 12L) / 100L) / 4L;  
00030     return (int)(day - 32075L + j1 + j2 - j3);  
00031 } 
00032 
00033 
00046 MTKt_status MtkUtcToUtcJd(
00047   char utc_datetime[MTKd_DATETIME_LEN], 
00048   double jdUTC[2]  )
00049 {
00050   MTKt_status status_code; /* Return code of this function */
00051   int          scanCheck;        /* checks the return value of sscanf call */
00052   int          year;             /* year portion of date */
00053   int          month;            /* month portion of date */
00054   int          day;              /* day portion of date */
00055   int          hours;            /* hours of the given date */
00056   int          minutes;          /* minutes of the given date */
00057   double       seconds;
00058     
00059   scanCheck = sscanf(utc_datetime,"%4d-%2d-%2dT%2d:%2d:%lfZ",
00060                      &year, &month, &day, &hours, &minutes, &seconds);
00061   if (scanCheck != 6)
00062     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_BAD_ARGUMENT);
00063     
00064   if (month < 1 || month > 12)
00065     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_BAD_ARGUMENT);
00066   
00067   if (hours > 23)
00068      MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_BAD_ARGUMENT);
00069   
00070   if (minutes > 59)
00071      MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_BAD_ARGUMENT);
00072   
00073   if (seconds > 60.99999999)
00074   {
00075     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_BAD_ARGUMENT);
00076   }
00077   else if (seconds >= 60.0 && (minutes != 59 || hours != 23))
00078      MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_BAD_ARGUMENT);   
00079 
00080 
00081   if (seconds >= 60.0)
00082     seconds -= 1.0;
00083 
00084   jdUTC[1] = (hours * SECONDSperHOUR + minutes * SECONDSperMINUTE + seconds) /
00085                SECONDSperDAY;
00086   
00087   jdUTC[0] = julday(year, month, day) - 0.5;
00088 
00089   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00090 
00091 ERROR_HANDLE:
00092   return status_code;
00093 }
